title: Le Sanctuaire du CDI
text: Le CDI devient un statut d'exception, réservé aux fonctions critiques : santé, énergie, sécurité.
original_prompt:
Create a portrait A5 card design with ALL text elements visible and readable.

=== REQUIRED TEXT ON CARD (must appear exactly as written) ===
CATEGORY (small, top corner): "TRAVAIL & STATUTS"
TITLE (large, bold, prominent): "Le Sanctuaire du CDI"
DESCRIPTION (medium size, below illustration): "Le CDI devient un statut d'exception, réservé aux fonctions critiques : santé, énergie, sécurité."

=== CARD LAYOUT ===
- Top left corner: Category label "TRAVAIL & STATUTS" in small caps
- Top center: Large bold title "Le Sanctuaire du CDI"
- Center: The illustration described below
- Bottom: Description text "Le CDI devient un statut d'exception, réservé aux fonctions critiques : santé, énergie, sécurité."

=== ILLUSTRATION ===
A glowing energy shield protecting three icons beneath it: a medical cross, a lightning bolt, and a bridge. The area outside the shield is blurred and vulnerable.

=== STYLE ===
- Retro-futuristic isometric illustration, clean lines, vintage infographic feel
- Dominant color palette: Deep petrol blue (#1F3A3D)
- Background: Aged textured cream/off-white paper (#F5F5F2)
- Typography: Bold sans-serif for title, elegant serif for description
- The card should look like an official document from 2036
- All text must be in French and clearly legible
- Portrait orientation, A5 proportions
revised_prompt: Create a portrait A5 card design in a retro-futuristic isometric style. The dominant color palette is deep petrol blue (#1F3A3D), with a background of aged, textured cream paper (#F5F5F2). The card should have an official document feel from 2036. At the top left corner, place a small caps label, 'TRAVAIL & STATUTS'. The top center should feature a large, bold, sans-serif title, 'Le Sanctuaire du CDI'. At the center, design an illustration of a glowing energy shield protecting three icons: a medical cross, a lightning bolt, and a bridge, while the area outside the shield appears blurred and vulnerable. At the bottom, include a medium-sized, elegant serif description text, 'Le CDI devient un statut d'exception, réservé aux fonctions critiques : santé, énergie, sécurité.' Ensure all text is clear, legible, and in French.
